channel.title: Npc error (desperate)
channel.description: Ok, so everything on my server works. But when people connect, the npcs and objects like altars and stuff are gone. All of that, so monsters and so on. My question is, why does this happen? If it works for me with no errors, why does it do this when I upload it to the bps with no problems?

item.title: Npc error (desperate)
item.dc:creator: @Iamme Iamme
item.description:
@Iamme wrote:

Yes, bps is vps (on my phone…)

And my run.bat doesn’t say anything, but I’ll check when I get back home.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc error (desperate)
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

BPS is VPS, I am guessing?

Make sure you are copying the autospawn.cfg file across into the same directory it was in on your other pc. This may require you to update the paths in npchandler.java.

Does your run.bat say anything?

Read full topic
